title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 178.3 - Residential property
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 178.3 - Residential property

State Regulations

For the purposes of this Part, the term residence or
residential property shall include any of the following: (a) a one-family residence; (b) a two-family residence; (c) a three-family residence; (d) a residential cooperative apartment; and
(e) a residential condominium
unit. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19

178.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
